CustomField.formula: CASE(Subject, "Benvenuto/a a Trusted Shops!", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Grazie per la tua domanda di adesione - ora controlliamo i tuoi dati", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),1,0), "Grazie per la registrazione", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),2,0), "Congratulazioni!", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Ti diamo il benvenuto! Inizia subito con Trusted Shops", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Benvenuto a Trusted Shops!", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),4,0), "Congratulazioni! Ancora più servizi per la Sua adesione", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),3,0), "Congratulazioni! Ancora più domain per la Sua adesione", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),3,0), "Siamo qui per Lei:Il Suo interlocutore personale", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), "Scopri il nostro team", if(OR(SuppliedEmail="members@trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="members@e.trustedshops.com", SuppliedEmail="marketing@e.trustedshops.com"),5,0), 0)
CustomField.label: Application Subject IT
